WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is currently not possible. You can however clone the conditional formattign and assign it to multiple cell style instances.
WorkItem.Description: As it could be done in Microsoft Excel i want to apply a conditional formatting rule to a range of cells instead adding 1 rule for every cell. My document contains a rule applied to all cells in one row. Excel can define the range ie. =$G$16:$G$93.
WorkItem.Summary: Conditional formatting rules applyable to cell range?

Comments.Message: When trying i experience the following error: Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Cell coordinate string can not be a range of cells.' in \libs\PHPExcel\Worksheet.php:756 Stack trace: #0 index.php(90): PHPExcel_Worksheet->getStyle('$C$2:$C$5') #1 {main} thrown in libs\PHPExcel\Worksheet.php on line 756. Is a range definition already supported in PHPExcel? Or is it planned to be implemented?
